description: Deletes a knowledge base. Before deleting a knowledge base, you should disassociate the knowledge base from any agents that it is associated with by making a DisassociateAgentKnowledgeBase request.

parameters.name: knowledgeBaseId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the knowledge base to delete.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the knowledge base that was deleted.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the knowledge base and whether it has been successfully deleted.
